root.specsKey: Nikon Coolpix S31 Waterproof Point & Shoot Camera (Brown)
185 g (with Battery and SD Memory Card)
Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL12 (with Terminal Cover), Camera Strap, USB Cable UC-E16, ViewNX 2 CD, Brush, Reference Manual CD, Battery Charger MH-65 (with Power Cable)

"Lens Construction: 6 Elements in 5 Groups, Focus-area Selection Center, Face Detection, Frame Coverage Shooting Mode: 97% Horizontal and 97% Vertical (Compared to Actual Picture), Frame Coverage Playback Mode: 100% Horizontal and 100% Vertical (Compared to Actual Picture), Shooting Modes: Point and Shoot, Choose a Style (Shoot Close-ups, Photograph Food, Shoot at Intervals, Shoot Under Water, Take Series of Pictures, Photograph Fireworks, Mirror, Take Soft Pictures, Create Diorama Effect, Take Series of Pictures: Four Images at Rate of About 1.5 fps, Exposure Control Programmed Auto Exposure and Exposure Compensation: -2.0 - .0 EV in increments of 1 EV, Shutter: Mechanical and Charge-coupled Electronic Shutter, Aperture Electronically-controlled ND Filter (-3 AV) Selection, Range 2 Steps (f/3.3 and f/9.3 [W]), Flash Control: TTL Auto Flash with Monitor Preflashes, Data Transfer Protocol: MTP, PTP, 1/4 inch Tripod Socket, Operating Temperature: 0° C - 40° C, Humidity: 85%, Waterproof, Dustproof, Shockproof, Fun Filters, Motion Blur Reduction, Easy to Handle, One Button-one Function, Crisp 720p Video Recording, Automatic Power-off"
Best Point and Shoot for Home as well as Outdoors.

I've ordered same from flipkart because this product was not available in any retail store.Build quality and protection of this camera is awesome. I took it to beach and it survived very well in water and beach sand.It is something that you can wash after getting dirty.Interface is pretty simple, basic modes, flash, brightness adjustments. Simple that anyone can pick up and go on.I personally use Canon 650D DSLR, but it needs to be taken care of. You cannot take it anywhere in rains, muds you want.Even if you are having very high budget for P&S, I'll suggest to either add up your budget and buy DSLR,or go for this rugged one.Because there are no significant photo quality differences in Day photography of P&S.Go for it.
Great for the monsoon on the beach!

Fantastic camera for heavy rain and also shock proof which is great for kids and simple to use!!!!! The free pouch is too small for this particular camera. Great water depth for a camera for the swimming pool.

Checked the camera at a local store and for the price point, it is pretty good buy. Image Quality is as good as any camera available in the range and those sport this 1/2.3 sensor. But the selling point is that it is a rugged camera, which gives the buyer peace of mind. Any other rugged camera costs anything around 15k(off course they have better specification), but here you can get this for less than 6k. I already have added this to my wishlist and I know it will be very good secondary camera that I can carry to a pool, river or beaches (or even playing holi) without have to worry. About damaging it accidentally dropping it in water

I gifted this to a friend of mine who has two very naughty children at home. This camera was best for him as it is shockproof, dustproof, and waterproof. He is really very happy with it. It obviously takes good pictures too :-)
A Good Camera to gift Kids

Bought this camera for my 7 year old. She has been throughly enjoying the camera. Have been using it for a month now. The Daylight pictures are good. Pictures indoors need to be taken with care as there is no Image Stabalization. The packaging as usual was good. Time taken to receive the camera though within the SLA seemed longer than the usual time taken by Flipkart. Could have been an issue with the vendor.Received a TIMEX wrist watch as a gift along with the camera. :-) which was a surprise. - Simple buttons. Top Left of Video and Top Right for Photographs. - Not much of controls and hence the ropes of photography can be picked up quickly. - The only available phone in this price range that can withstand rough use.

I have used it for a while now. Battery is ok. Picture quality is very good for the price. Best thing is that although it is rugged and water proof, it does not look like one. Big buttons at the back is too simple to use even for kids. Overall a very good purchase.
